title: Cannot install Intel compilers
body:
This fails:
```
$ spack install intel-parallel-studio +openmp %gcc@6.3.0-spack
==> Installing intel-parallel-studio
==> Using cached archive: /Users/eschnett/src/spack/var/spack/cache/intel-parallel-studio/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.2.tgz
==> Already staged intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.2-7xgjmf6uvvvvqlfuvldhgrcxqkb6odww in /Users/eschnett/src/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-parallel-studio-professional.2017.2-7xgjmf6uvvvvqlfuvldhgrcxqkb6odww
==> Already patched intel-parallel-studio
==> Building intel-parallel-studio [Package]
==> Found already existing license /Users/eschnett/src/spack/etc/spack/licenses/intel/license.lic
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 4:
    './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
/Users/eschnett/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/intel/package.py:96, in install:
     74       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     75
     76           if not hasattr(self, "intel_prefix"):
     77               self.intel_prefix = self.prefix
     78
     79           silent_config_filename = 'silent.cfg'
     80           with open(silent_config_filename, 'w') as f:
     81               f.write("""
     82   ACCEPT_EULA=accept
     83   PSET_MODE=install
     84   CONTINUE_WITH_INSTALLDIR_OVERWRITE=yes
     85   PSET_INSTALL_DIR=%s
     86   NONRPM_DB_DIR=%s
     87   ACTIVATION_LICENSE_FILE=%s
     88   ACTIVATION_TYPE=license_file
     89   PHONEHOME_SEND_USAGE_DATA=no
     90   CONTINUE_WITH_OPTIONAL_ERROR=yes
     91   COMPONENTS=%s
     92   """ % (self.intel_prefix, self.intel_prefix, self.global_license_file,
     93                   self.intel_components))
     94
     95           install_script = Executable("./install.sh")
  >> 96           install_script('--silent', silent_config_filename)

See build log for details:
  /private/var/folders/gl/zvl8d6415vsbkd50nnll95k40000gs/T/eschnett/spack-stage/spack-stage-HtWWCd/parallel_studio_xe_2017_update2/spack-build.out
```

This is the error:
```
==> './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
./install.sh: line 63: cd: /private/var/folders/gl/zvl8d6415vsbkd50nnll95k40000gs/T/eschnett/spack-stage/spack-stage-HtWWCd/parallel_studio_xe_2017_update2/./../Resources/pset: No such file or directory
The IA-32 architecture host installation is no longer supported.
The product cannot be installed on this system.
Please refer to product documentation for more information.

Quitting!
```

The problem seems to be that the install script looks for a path with `../Resources` in its name. The `pset` file mentioned in the error message does exist, but is at a different location.
